solution_line_template: The total number of shirts for all his kids is {num_kids} * {shirts_per_kid} = <<{num_kids}*{shirts_per_kid}={total_shirts}>>{total_shirts} shirts.
The total number of needed buttons is {total_shirts} * {buttons_per_shirt} = <<{total_shirts}*{buttons_per_shirt}={total_buttons}>>{total_buttons} buttons.
